_header: A white horse up the hill
_description: On the colors of horses — two couplets

BodWoodEmpt18.Transcription:
A white hors up þe hilleA blacke hors down þe hilleA
                    gray hors in a gavell wayAnd a brown bay is best of all assay
BodWoodEmpt18.Editions:
Hands,  Rachel. 
             “Horse-Dealing Lore, or a Fifteenth-century ‘Help to
                Discourse’?” 
             Medium Ævum
         41 (1972): 230-9: 237.
Orme,  Nicholas. 
             “Children and Literature in Medieval England.” 
             Medium Ævum
         68 (1999): 218-46: 221.
